title: Typographic tourism: Lyon
content: If anybody has tip for typographic tourism in Lyon ( or Paris ) I would love to hear about it!
author: ebensorkin

comments.content:
Hi Eben

Well I just googled "musee imprimerie nationale france" and got [the local museum.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144659/http:/www.imprimerie.lyon.fr/imprimerie/) Although [this alternative site](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144659/http:/www.garamonpatrimoine.org/news.html) might be more interesting.

If you're in Paris and you like votive statuary and inscriptional type, the cemetery Pere Lachaise is what we might call ’dead good'! They have a [nice site](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144659/http:/www.pere-lachaise.com/perelachaise.htm) too.
